caption.center: CARL W. FRAZIER v. FRANCIS A. HOWARD. Warden.

opinion.posture: Respondent directed to answer petition for habeas corpus and show cause, if any he has, why writ should not issue as prayed, answer to be in compliance with Provisional Order No. 7. Public Defender directed to furnish counsel other than Paul E. Kelley to represent petitioner in further prosecution of his petition.
opinion.attorneys:
Carl W. Frazier, petitioner, pro se.
Herbert F. DeSimone, Attorney General, Donald P. Ryan, Asst. Attorney General, for respondent.
